title: Shitty download speed
body: My download speed is usually 20 Mbps when I'm on steam or ut, but when I try to update or download something for league it downloads at .1 - .2 Mbps. Does league just not like fast internet?

replies.body: There could be something with your network that failing to maintain a strong connection to the patching servers.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up, making sure to go over each step to strenghten your connection.  I also recommend using the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings as well.  Hopefully, this will show an improvement for you.
